content.about: Tampa Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Tampa area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Linda J.
reviews.content: The antique appraisal was thorough, but I found their pricing a bit high compared to others.

reviews.author: Nancy R.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Elizabeth W.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Tampa provides professional antique appraisal services in the Tampa area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Karen M.
reviews.content: The antique appraisal was thorough, but I found their pricing a bit high compared to others.

reviews.author: Susan T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Elizabeth T.
reviews.content: Good service overall, though the turnaround time for my antique appraisal was longer than expected.

reviews.author: Nancy A.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Heritage Valuations Tampa delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.
